plot: Two martial artist friends from China are performing a show in the States. Trouble starts when one of them decides to defect and stay in America.
title: Long zai tian ya
plot_es: Two martial artist friends from China are performing a show in the States. Trouble starts when one of them decides to defect and stay in America.
plot_en: Two martial artist friends from China are performing a show in the States. Trouble starts when one of them decides to defect and stay in America.
